Often, when i create a new swing class (did not try it with awt or swt)
the file is created, but the class is only written partly... stopping with an
errormessage to check my log file. This error doesn't occur after several a
fresh installations, but when it happends there is no way of creating any swing
classes anymore.

Mr Villain ;-)   Is this problem still out there?  We need more information on
recreating this problem to drive a fix.  If it is a recreatable problem, we
would like to address this one in our 1.0.2 service pack.

Given the following note I received directly, closing this defect:

>
>------- You are receiving this mail because: -------
>You reported the bug, or are watching the reporter.
>
>
>  
>
Thank you very much for your support, but unfortunately, after trying
several times, i installed the new eclipse 3.0.1. So i can't give more
information about this problem, but the ved is working perfectly now.
I'm sorry for the long delay of my reply or any inconvenience it may
have caused.

Thanks again for such a wonderful editor i'm getting more and more used
to it :-D
